trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_SEQ_00<tab>Little does Nidhana know that she is about to send you on another errand.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Varshahn.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Varshahn again.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_TODO_02<tab>Gather information at the tower outpost.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Varshahn.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_TODO_04<tab>Mount the hamsa.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_TODO_05<tab>Ride the hamsa to the Giantsgall Grounds.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Zeynuha.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_000<tab>If you will excuse me, I shall return to my work on the talisman.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_001<tab>Ah, you are both back. Excellent.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_002<tab>I have a message for you, Mistress Nidhana.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_003<tab>It would seem the stores of giantsgall are running low.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_004<tab>What? But when last I looked, there was still plenty...

TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_005<tab>I suspect that was before Urianger told everyone about their tempering cure, and Estinien shared his knowledge of dragons. Your peers have since been inspired to fashion a number of new talisman prototypes.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_006<tab>I see... Well, if it leads to new possibilities, then far be it from me to complain, but we will need to replenish our stores...
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_007<tab>I should be happy to tend to this if you like.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_008<tab>As much as I appreciate the offer, my dear boy, I can't in good conscience send you out there alone while kidnappers are at large.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─loath though I am to press another task on you so soon, might I ask you to fetch the giantsgall?

TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_010<tab>In case you're not familiar, giantsgall is a type of ore found on the island. Owing to its hardness and aetherial conductivity, it has applications in many disciplines─alchemy not least of all.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_011<tab>The quarry where it is found, aptly named Giantsgall Grounds, isn't far away, so it shouldn't take much of your time. May we impose on you once more?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_012<tab>Thank you! Upon arriving at the grounds, please seek out a man named Zeynuha. He will furnish you with the ore.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_013<tab>At the very least, permit me to accompany you. It so happens I have an errand of my own that will take me to the outpost nearby.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_014<tab>May we borrow a pair of hamsa, Mistress Nidhana?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_015<tab>By all means. Do try to be patient with them─those that survived are still in training.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_016<tab>I will bring the hamsa to the entrance. Meet me there when you are ready.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NIDHANA_000_020<tab>Despite his tender years, Varshahn is thoughtful and dependable. It's easy to see why he was chosen to be the satrap's attendant!
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_030<tab>Here are our hamsa, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If the creatures look familiar, it is because they are close kin to your Eorzean dodos.

TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_031<tab>Hamsa have long been kept as livestock in Thavnair, and many a hatchery may be found here. Alas, the largest of these was recently razed by monsters from the tower.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_032<tab>On account of said hatchery being situated near the tower, the Radiant Host repurposed its remnants as an outpost.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_033<tab>That is where my errand takes me, and your own destination is but a stone's throw away.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_034<tab>If you have no objections, let us first make for the outpost. We set forth at your word.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_040<tab>You are ready? Then let us depart. You need only ride and relax─my bird and I will take the lead for yours to follow.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_Q1_000_041<tab>Mount the hamsa and travel to the outpost?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_042<tab>Let us be off. If you haven't ridden dodos before, be warned that they have a wobbling gait.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_043<tab>That spectacular formation stretching out over the water is called Khadga─a word which means “sword.”
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_044<tab>This sword, legend holds, was wielded by the Manusya against the Mrga before it was cast down at conflict's end.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_045<tab>To the left and requiring no introduction is the tower. As you can see, it straddles a small isle.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_046<tab>Almost there. Though the main part of the hatchery is atop the cliff, the outpost itself is on the beach.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_047<tab>And here we are. Manned by the Radiant Host, this outpost is our first line of defense against the tower.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_048<tab>Well, well, who should it be but young Varshahn. On an errand for the satrap?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_049<tab>I am. His Excellency bade me come to collect your report.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_050<tab>He also wished to express his heartfelt gratitude to the brave men and women of the Radiant Host for their unflagging dedication.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_051<tab>We simply do our duty, but we are honored to receive His Excellency's regard.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_052<tab>And yet, for his boundless benevolence, his treatment of one so young could be regarded as...callous.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_053<tab>Though we have enjoyed relative peace and calm these past few days, this remains the front line of battle. No place for children.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_054<tab>Your predecessor too often traveled alone. It's been, what, two years now since you took over? I wonder how the fellow is faring...
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_055<tab>Like those before him, he went on to represent the satrap in foreign lands. Wherever he may now be, I am certain he is well.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_056<tab>As for myself, I assure you that all I do, I do of my own volition, and gladly. I pray you do not think ill of His Excellency.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_057<tab>Certainly not, lad... Whatever happens, my faith in the satrap is unwavering. But still I worry for you.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_058<tab>We would be overcome with sadness if something were to befall you, for you are as a little brother to us all. Take care, do you hear?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_059<tab>I will, Nahbdeen. Thank you.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_060<tab>And who might this be? Not Hannish by the look of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_061<tab>Permit me to introduce <var 29 EB02 /var>, of the Eorzean contingent, come to assist in the making of the talisman.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_062<tab>From Eorzea, you say! Towers have appeared over there too, yes? Tell me, what is the situation like?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_063<tab>May I suggest that you exchange information with our soldiers? Both parties would stand to learn something of value, I believe.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_064<tab>An excellent idea. Given the unprecedented nature of the threat, some of ours are understandably anxious. We would be glad for any tidings you can share.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_065<tab>You two, bring Varshahn the latest report, and answer any questions he may have.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_070<tab>All appears quiet with the tower at the moment. I daresay the soldiers won't mind if you approached them.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_BREEDINGSTAFF04374_000_075<tab>The last monster that came out of the tower laid waste to the hatchery, slaughtering many good hamsa. The poor creatures didn't deserve it...
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>This is the fellow that carried you hither. Its breathing is somewhat ragged, perhaps due to its inexperience as a mount.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_090<tab>It occurs to me I have yet to properly introduce our company.

TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_091<tab>We are the Radiant Host, a military order under the satrap's command. Our duty is to preserve peace in the land, be it patrolling the streets or dealing with heretofore unknown threats such as now.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_092<tab>We train hard, and admit only capable warriors to our ranks. Even so, we've struggled to contend with the fiends from the tower.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_093<tab>Though we succeeded in striking them down on the two occasions they came in force, we had to pay a heavy price.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_094<tab>What of the towers in Eorzea? Do they likewise spawn monsters?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_095<tab>So it's much the same everywhere... With every nation struggling, we cannot expect calls for outside aid to be answered.

TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_NAHBDEEN_000_096<tab>My thanks not only for the information, but for accompanying Varshahn besides. While he's wise beyond his years, he's still a child, and we couldn't bear to see him come to harm.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_KHUTEEYU_000_097<tab>You wish to know about the tower? To be honest, we know little and less about it ourselves.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_KHUTEEYU_000_098<tab>This “Tower of Zot,” as folk have taken to calling it, suddenly appeared where it did on the isle of Narunnair.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_KHUTEEYU_000_099<tab>We're safe from its influence at this distance, but go too far into the water, and you'll expose yourself to its corrupting aether.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_KHUTEEYU_000_100<tab>You're a foreigner, aren't you? How are they dealing with the tower in your homeland?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_KHUTEEYU_000_101<tab>Our struggles are not unique... Then our hopes still lie with the talismans. We must keep the monsters contained until they're ready.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_KHUTEEYU_000_102<tab>When the tower first appeared, we sent scouts on a boat to investigate. But it quickly became apparent that something was amiss.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_KHUTEEYU_000_103<tab>One after another our comrades were corrupted. We could only look on in horror as they slew each other...
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_IMHUDI_000_104<tab>Ah, I've heard about you. The visitor from Eorzea. Is there anything you can tell us about the Telophoroi?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_IMHUDI_000_105<tab>We know that they're the ones behind the tower, and that they've declared war on the whole world.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_IMHUDI_000_106<tab>But why are they doing this? What is it that they want? This, we don't understand.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_IMHUDI_000_107<tab>...What? They want to die...and take everyone with them!? What madness is this!?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_IMHUDI_000_108<tab>Well, you can bet that we won't let those bastards have their way! We'll fight them with everything we have, like our Eorzean and Far Eastern brothers!
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_IMHUDI_000_109<tab>Grrr, those demented fools... If they want to go to hell, they can bloody well arrange their own passage, and leave the rest of us out of it!
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_120<tab>Finished speaking with the soldiers, have you? I hope it was as enlightening for you as it was for them.

TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_121<tab>As a neutral nation and trading hub both, Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han ordinarily receives a steady stream of news from abroad. Alas, this stream dried up when trading vessels stopped coming.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_122<tab>Amidst the dearth of information, everyone will have been grateful for your account.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_123<tab>...But come, you had best see to your original errand. As mine will keep me here awhile longer, however, I'm afraid I cannot guide you the rest of the way.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_124<tab>Worry not, the path is straightforward─you need but follow the road east. Upon the hamsa, you will arrive before you know it.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_125<tab>Brief though it was, I enjoyed our time together. Till we meet again.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_VARSHAHN_000_130<tab>Lest you have forgotten, to get to the Giantsgall Grounds, you need but follow the road east. The hamsa should deliver you there quite quickly.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>Though the hamsa appears to want to return home, it reluctantly offers you its back.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_SYSTEM_100_140<tab>Should you become separated from your steed, speak with the Radiant beastkeeper at the Hamsa Hatchery to mount it again.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_Q2_000_141<tab>Mount the hamsa?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_BREEDINGSTAFF04374_000_150<tab>If you're looking for your hamsa, it returned here by itself a while ago. You still have need of it?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_SYSTEM_000_160<tab>No sooner do you arrive at your destination than the hamsa dashes off...
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_SYSTEM_000_165<tab>Speak with the Radiant beastkeeper at the Hamsa Hatchery to mount the hamsa, then ride it to the Giantsgall Grounds.
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_ZEYNUHA_000_170<tab>Aye, this is indeed the Giantsgall Grounds, and I am Zeynuha. Is there something you require?
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_ZEYNUHA_000_171<tab>Giantsgall for the alchemists, you say? But of course they shall have it!
TEXT_AKTKMA118_04374_ZEYNUHA_000_172<tab>They labor tirelessly to deal with the tower, and 'tis the least we can do to provide them with the materials they need.
